client_id.description: Input this field if you want authorize through personal account

client_secret.description: Input this field if you want authorize through personal account

refresh_token.description: Input this field if you want authorize through personal account

site_urls.description: Website URLs property; do not include the domain-level property in the list

start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

service_account_info.description: Input this field if you want authorize through service account
